content.text:
# IIFA Digital Awards

}}

Series: Panchayat Season 3 (10)

The 1st IIFA Digital Awards were held on 8–9 March 2025, at the Jaipur Exhibition & Convention Centre in Jaipur, India.
On the web films front, Amar Singh Chamkila led the ceremony with 6 nominations, followed by Maharaj with 5 nominations. Amar Singh Chamkila, Do Patti and Sector 36 won two awards each, thus becoming the most-awarded web-films at the ceremony.
On the series front, Panchayat Season 3 led the ceremony with 10 nominations, followed by Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar with 6 nominations. Panchayat Season 3 won a leading 4 awards, thus becoming the most-awarded series at the ceremony.
Winners and nominees
The nominations were announced on 29 January 2025. The winners were announced on 8 March 2025.
